goals.active: Search the swamp for survivors of the undead attacks.
goals.complete: I accompanied the Vigil knights into Lychcroft Mere, where we found children hiding from the undead. They'd seen a Seraph soldier in the swamp, doing something...creepy. I should consult with the rest of the Order representatives.
I met with the three orders and learned about a missing Seraph named Kellach. The Vigil and Order of Whispers each had their own ideas about what we should do next, but it was up to me to decide.
